REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0922 reute r f BC-CANNON-GROUP-<CAN>-DE 03-03 0038

TEXT.TITLE: CANNON GROUP <CAN> DECLINES COMMENT ON STOCK
TEXT.BODY: The New York Stock Exchange said Cannon Group Inc declined to comment on the unusual activity in its common stock. Cannon's stock is up 1-3/8 points at 10-1/8. Reuter
